parameters.name: Sample_UTC
parameters.description:
Universal time of the sample at the spacecraft (UTC, spacecraft event         
                        time). The time appears as 6 integer columns (year, day of year, hour,        
                        minute, second, millisecond). Individual elements of the time column are      
                        separated by a single ASCII space character and have leading zeros            
                        omitted. The individual elements can be read by using the FORTRAN format      
                        '(1X,I4,1X,I3,3(1X,I2),1X,I3)' IYR IDOY IHR IMIN ISEC IMSEC

parameters.name: Background_Flux
parameters.description:
Estimate of instrument background, which is caused primarily by               
                        penetrating particles (galactic cosmic rays and solar energetic               
                        particles with energies greater than 20 MeV).

parameters.name: MAG_AZ
parameters.description:
Azimuth of local magnetic field (B) in ER sensor coordinates.
                        ER azimuth is defined in the ER X-Y plane with zero at the 
                        boundary between sectors 0 and 15.  Note that ER coordinates are 
                        left handed, so that azimuth increases with sector number.

parameters.name: MAG_EL
parameters.description:
Elevation of local magnetic field (B) in ER sensor coordinates.
                        ER elevation is measured out of the ER X-Y plane.  The field of 
                        view extends to +/- 7 degrees elevation.

parameters.name: MAG_Angle_Error
parameters.description: Angular uncertainty in local magnetic (B) field direction.
